teal.render.geometry

Class GeomUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • teal.render.geometry.GeomUtil

  • public class GeomUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some utility functions for manipulating GeometryArrays.

      • printGeometry

        public static void printGeometry(javax.media.j3d.GeometryArray geom)
        Prints the contents of the supplied GeometryArray.
        Parameters:
        geom - GeometryArray to print.

      • moveGeometry

        public static void moveGeometry(javax.media.j3d.GeometryArray geom,
                                javax.vecmath.Point3d offset)
        Adds an offset translation to all points in the supplied GeometryArray.
        Parameters:
        geom - GeometryArray to translate.
        offset - Point3d offset to apply to the GeometryArray.

      • transposeGeometry

        public static void transposeGeometry(javax.media.j3d.GeometryArray geom,
                                     int view)
        Transposes the coordinates of supplied Geometry about the principle axes.
        Parameters:
        geom - GeometryArray to rotate.
        view - Axis to transpose about (ROTATE_Y, ROTATE_Z).
